name: part_005
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】ねね～ちらい～ぶ４年目もよろしくね！ゲストいっぱいでお祝い！【 #桃鈴ねねの４年目 】 [5Ney9Z_WnTU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the high-energy song performance with Nene, Lamy, Fauna, and Koyori.
scenes.song_name: 太陽曰く燃えよカオス (Taiyou Iwaku Moeyo Chaos)

scenes.description: Performance of 'Otona Blue' with Nene and guests Kanata and Noel, wearing school uniform-style outfits.

subtitles.original: (うー！にゃー！)
subtitles.english: (Uhh! Nyaa!)

subtitles.original: 閑散耳は
subtitles.english: Quiet ears are...

subtitles.original: (うー！にゃー！)
subtitles.english: (Uhh! Nyaa!)

subtitles.original: 何だんだい？
subtitles.english: What is it?

subtitles.original: (うー！にゃー！)
subtitles.english: (Uhh! Nyaa!)

subtitles.original: 欲求不満は言葉にしなくちゃ
subtitles.english: Frustration must be put into words

subtitles.original: ほら嫌、うれしょ (にゃー！)
subtitles.english: See, I hate it, but I'm happy (Nyaa!)

subtitles.original: 太陽なんか眩しくて
subtitles.english: The sun is just so bright

subtitles.original: 闇の方が無限で (ドキドキ)
subtitles.english: The darkness is infinite (Thump-thump)

subtitles.original: 太陽ばっか眩しくて
subtitles.english: It's nothing but the bright sun

subtitles.original: 闇の方が素敵 (にゃー！)
subtitles.english: The darkness is more wonderful (Nyaa!)

subtitles.original: Chaos! Chaos! I wanna Chaos!
subtitles.english: Chaos! Chaos! I wanna Chaos!

subtitles.original: 燃えよ混沌 無敵 (ドキドキ)
subtitles.english: Burn on, Chaos, invincible (Thump-thump)

subtitles.original: Chaos! Chaos! 歌せら Chaos!
subtitles.english: Chaos! Chaos! Make us sing, Chaos!

subtitles.original: 燃えるような気持ち (おー！)
subtitles.english: This burning feeling (Ohh!)

subtitles.original: 我々！遣れ遣れ！世界は…！
subtitles.english: We are! Do it, do it! The world is...!

subtitles.original: (うー！にゃー！うー！にゃー！)
subtitles.english: (Uhh! Nyaa! Uhh! Nyaa!)

subtitles.original: 枕ポカポカ 無謀な神々
subtitles.english: Warm pillows, reckless gods

subtitles.original: 私とあなたと僕だけは違うの
subtitles.english: Only me, you, and I are different

subtitles.original: 絆のガブムリヤリ去れがち
subtitles.english: The bonds tend to be torn away

subtitles.original: 私があなたを守るけどピンチ
subtitles.english: I'll protect you, but we're in a pinch

subtitles.original: 可笑しいな 逃げるぞ蠢くぞ
subtitles.english: That's strange, let's flee, they're squirming

subtitles.original: (何終わってる？)
subtitles.english: (What's over?)

subtitles.original: ドッパリオリオリアリ ここまで来ました
subtitles.english: I've come all the way here

subtitles.original: 私は黙って敵たちを蹴散らす
subtitles.english: I'll silently kick the enemies away

subtitles.original: 不燃メラメラ ここではダメです
subtitles.english: Non-flammable burning, this is no good

subtitles.original: 私に黙ってスカートはしないで
subtitles.english: Don't hide your skirt from me

subtitles.original: 望むなら (全・全・全滅)
subtitles.english: If you wish (To-To-Total Annihilation)

subtitles.original: しましょうね (敵なんだやれやれ)
subtitles.english: Let's do it (Good grief, they're enemies)

subtitles.original: 願わくば跡形もなくで
subtitles.english: Hopefully, without a trace

subtitles.original: あら、いらないでしょ (にゃー！)
subtitles.english: Oh, you don't need it, right? (Nyaa!)

subtitles.original: 現在何と危険だった
subtitles.english: How dangerous it was just now

subtitles.original: 光をもおください (ピカピカ)
subtitles.english: Please give me light too (Sparkle)

subtitles.original: 現在何と危険だった
subtitles.english: How dangerous it was just now

subtitles.original: 光もんで刺激 (おー！)
subtitles.english: Stimulated by the light (Ohh!)

subtitles.original: Madness! Madness! You want a madness!
subtitles.english: Madness! Madness! You want a madness!

subtitles.original: 読めば暴騰過激 (ドキドキ)
subtitles.english: Radical if you read it (Thump-thump)

subtitles.original: Madness! Madness! I'm annoying madness!
subtitles.english: Madness! Madness! I'm annoying madness!

subtitles.original: 読めばきっとおしまい (おー！)
subtitles.english: It's surely the end if you read it (Ohh!)

subtitles.original: 這い寄る！混沌！遣るらとほ！
subtitles.english: Creeping! Chaos! Nyarlathotep!

subtitles.original: 太陽なんか眩しくて
subtitles.english: The sun is just so bright

subtitles.original: 闇の方が無限で (ドキドキ)
subtitles.english: The darkness is infinite (Thump-thump)

subtitles.english: It's nothing but the bright sun

subtitles.original: 闇の方が素敵 (にゃー！)
subtitles.english: The darkness is more wonderful (Nyaa!)

subtitles.original: Chaos! Chaos! I wanna Chaos!
subtitles.english: Chaos! Chaos! I wanna Chaos!

subtitles.original: 燃えよ混沌 無敵 (ドキドキ)
subtitles.english: Burn on, Chaos, invincible (Thump-thump)

subtitles.original: Chaos! Chaos! 歌せら Chaos!
subtitles.english: Chaos! Chaos! Make us sing, Chaos!

subtitles.original: 燃えるような気持ち (おー！)
subtitles.english: This burning feeling (Ohh!)

subtitles.original: 這い寄る！混沌！遣るらとほ！
subtitles.english: Creeping! Chaos! Nyarlathotep!

subtitles.original:
オトナブルー
(作詞：新しい学校のリーダーズ　作曲：yonkey)
subtitles.english:
Otona Blue
(Lyrics: ATARASHII GAKKO!  Composition: yonkey)

subtitles.original: わかってる 欲しいんでしょ
subtitles.english: I know, you want it, don't you?

subtitles.original: 艶やかな この唇
subtitles.english: These glossy lips

subtitles.original: 柔肌をそっと引き寄せる
subtitles.english: Gently drawing in my soft skin

subtitles.original: 息を呑むほどに 甘い蜜
subtitles.english: Honey so sweet it'll take your breath away

subtitles.original: わかってる 欲しいんでしょ
subtitles.english: I know, you want it, don't you?

subtitles.original: 二度見する この身体
subtitles.english: This body that'll make you look twice

subtitles.original: 街ひとり歩けば 皆々様
subtitles.english: When I walk the streets alone, everyone

subtitles.original: 視線が絡みつく
subtitles.english: Has their eyes tangled around me

subtitles.original: ねぇ、何を期待してるの？
subtitles.english: Hey, what are you expecting?

subtitles.original: そのうちじゃなく 今すぐがいいの
subtitles.english: I don't want 'someday,' I want it right now

subtitles.original: 大人の恋に 焦がれて
subtitles.english: Longing for an adult romance

subtitles.original: 見た目よりも残る あどけない
subtitles.english: More than the looks, there's an innocent

subtitles.original: 心だけが 先走り
subtitles.english: Heart that keeps running ahead

subtitles.original: 青い蕾のまま
subtitles.english: Remaining as an unripe bud

subtitles.original: オトナブルー
subtitles.english: Otona Blue

subtitles.original: わかってる 欲しいんでしょ
subtitles.english: I know, you want it, don't you?

subtitles.original: 刺激する 私のすべて
subtitles.english: Stimulating my everything

subtitles.original: 冷めた瞳まで魅了する
subtitles.english: Fascinating even cold eyes

subtitles.original: いつかは花になる アマリリス
subtitles.english: An amaryllis that will bloom someday
